title: Margot Robbie takes a walk on the wild side in NYC as she flashes her abs
text:
She stars in the highly anticipated action film Birds Of Prey.

And Margot Robbie took a walk on the wild side while out in New York City on Tuesday.

The Wolf Of Wall Street actress, 29, flashed her abs in a black crop top along with a leopard print flannel coat.

Wild thing: Margot Robbie took a walk on the wild side while out in New York City on Tuesday

The actress had an air of cool to her as she strode outside of the hotel, looking edgy and trendy from head to toe.

Margot teamed the black crop top with a matching pair of yoga pants, white sneakers, a leather mini backpack, a stylish pair of large shades.

Her golden locks framed her radiant complexion, which was touched up with a hint of pink blush and a berry tint on her lips.

Though she kept the accessories to a minimum, Margot gave her look another edgy pop by wearing an array of delicate silver rings across her fingers.

Ready for fall: Robbie was ready for the crisp autumn air in a long flannel coat

Top of the crops! The star showcased her fab abs with her black sports bra

It won't be long until Margot will be back on the big screen as the crazed villainous Harley Quinn.

The actress will be returning to her role as the wild and wacky vigilante in the upcoming film Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn), set for release on February 7, 2020.

Harley originally played the role as part of the 2016 film Suicide Squad, which also starred Will Smith and Jared Leto.

Back for more: It won't be long until Margot will be back on the big screen as the crazed villainous Harley Quinn

For now, fans have been getting their fill of Margot in the critically-acclaimed Quentin Tarantino film, Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood.

The film is set in Los Angeles in 1969, and sees Margot play the late Sharon Tate opposite Leonardo DiCaprio and Brad Pitt.

The comedy was released July 26, 2019.
description: The Wolf Of Wall Street actress, 29, flashed her abs in a black crop top along with a leopard print flannel coat. The actress had an air of cool to her as she strode outside of the hotel.
